title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
description: When creating a project, it should be possible to set the classpath and output location in a single operation.
OB: When creating a project, the user sets the source folder to 'src' and the output location to 'bin'.
EB: After changing the project properties, the user sets the source folder to be the project itself and the output location to also be the project itself.
SR:
1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location.
2. In the project properties, change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
